title: As much as it hurts me I have to give up my favorite role
body: Currently im sitting at S5 and I want to climb my way to gold, The only issue is I main support and Ive stubbenrly sticked to it as to this day it is my favorite role. But I think I have to be honest to the fact that im never going to be able to clim my way out of silver in sup It a miracle I managed to even get out of bronze. But if I ever want to actually get good at this game Im going to have to give up playing support.

replies.body: I'm not that good and I reached plat with support.

Well, a good support makes or breaks a team. Mechanically, it's pretty simple. But the macro required makes it a higher skill floor role. If you can provide everything your team doesn't, you should be able to climb. A good support carries their ADC, not the other way around, especially in lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Pie Cubed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=d4QAANZO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-30T18:26:36.283+0000)
>
> A good support carries their ADC, not the other way around, especially in lane.

I agree, when I'd play botlane I'd always notice if I'd lose as ADC it was because I had a bad support, and if I'd lose as a support it was because I played poorly. I have never lost a game because the ADC was bad, but I did lose lots because the support was bad. 

I only played Zyra (occasionally Morg) so that might have something to do with it though.
